item.title: Rootanika
item.description:
Rootanika

Rootanika is a fusion project between the open-source CNC machines of Root CNC and Mekanika CNC. The goal is to combine the best of both worlds into a modular, accessible, and powerful CNC machine for makers, hobbyists, and small workshops.

Project Goals

  • Combine the rigidity and strength of Root CNC with the user-friendly design and clean aesthetics of Mekanika CNC.
  • Design a fully customizable, belt-driven machine with a focus on reusable and accessible components.
  • Keep the target cost around ‚Ç¨800 (excluding spindle and spoilboard), making it affordable without compromising performance.
  • Document everything open-source following the principles of both original projects.

item.title: 2025-07-25 - Rascal CNC
item.description:
While browsing the web for information about ROOT CNC, I came across an intriguing CNC design:

Rascal CNC

The Rascal CNC is a hobby grade CNC machine designed BY the Community FOR the Community with the simple goal of being able to cut foam board airplanes.

Here are just a few benefits of owning a Rascal.

Most capable machine for the cost (under $500 USD) For the cost you won’t find a better suited machine to cut foam board and lite ply on its 30x30" (76cm) cut bed.
